typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		Segment as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		State as string,
		Category as string,
		Key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> listoforders
source(output(
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Product Name} as string,
		Discount as string,
		Sales as string,
		Profit as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Category as string,
		{Sub-Category} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> breakdownsales
listoforders, breakdownsales join(listoforders@Category == breakdownsales@Category,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sort(asc(listoforders@{Order ID}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
